items.sentence: Tom was impressed with how well Mary could speak French.
Tom was supposed to call Mary last night, but he forgot.
Tom watched Mary drive away and then got in his own car.
I don\'t think Tom would\'ve had the courage to do that.
Tom didn\'t think that Mary would get the better of him.
Tom didn\'t understand what Mary was trying to tell him.
Tom didn\'t want anybody to find out about him and Mary.
I\'ve already told everybody that I\'m moving to Boston.
Before it\'s cooked, butternut squash smells like melon.
Both Tom and Mary\'s resignations were announced Monday.
